message:
First, they tell you to "import antigravity"
http://xkcd.com/353/

and now, camera.face_detect()
http://alex.nisnevich.com/blog/2013/02/19/face_tracking_with_open_cv_and_a_usb_missile_launcher.html
story: Mohammad Tayseer shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: xkcd: Python
caption: xkcd.com
description: Warning: this comic occasionally contains strong language (which may be unsuitable for children), unusual humor (which may be unsuitable for adults), and advanced mathematics (which may be unsuitable for liberal-arts majors).

data.message: OpenCV (used though Python, here) already had face detection built in, long long ago (probably as early as 2005/2006, specially, that at that time Intel used to support it to run faster on their processors) and it even has a C# wrapper even before that :D Nothing really "Python"ish here :D
